src:
Kebakaran Rumah di Tambora Jakbar Diduga Akibat Ledakan Kompor Gas
07 Nov 2019, 22:12 by Indra Komara
Jakarta - Sebanyak dua rumah dan enam kios terbakar di Tambora, Jakarta Barat. Kebakaran diduga akibat ledakan kompor gas.
"Diduga terjadi ledakan kompor gas kemudian terbakar dan membesar," kata Kasi Ops Damkar Jakarta Barat, Rompis, dalam keterangannya, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Rompis menuturkan lokasi kebakaran berada di Jalan Jembatan Besi Raya RT 001 RW 05 Kelurahan Jembatan Besi, Kecamatan Tambora. Laporan awal adanya kebakaran diterima sekitar pukul 18.50 WIB.
Warga mendatangi pos kebakaran di Jembatan Besi. Kemudian sebanyak 23 unit mobil pemadam kebakaran meluncur ke lokasi.
Api bisa dipadamkan sekitar pukul 19.45 WIB. Tidak ada korban dalam peristiwa ini. Total kerugian akibat kebakaran ditaksir Rp 450.000.000.

(idn/gbr)
text:
House Fire in Tambora West Jakarta Allegedly Due to Gas Stove Explosion
Nov 7 2019, 22:12 by Indra Komara
Jakarta - As many as two houses and six stalls burned in Tambora, West Jakarta. The fire was allegedly caused by a gas stove explosion.
"Allegedly there was an explosion of a gas stove then burned and enlarged," said Head of West Jakarta Damkar Ops Section, Rompis, in his statement on Thursday (11/07/2019).
Rompis said the location of the fire was on Jalan Jembatan Besi Raya RT 001 RW 05 Kelurahan Jembatan Besi, Tambora District. Initial reports of fire were received at around 18.50 West Indonesia Time.
Residents come to the fire post at Jembatan Besi. Then as many as 23 fire trucks drove to the location.
The fire can be extinguished around 19.45 WIB. There were no victims in this incident. Total losses from fire were estimated at Rp 450,000,000.

(idn / pic)
